element.name: TChart.Title
element.short: Chart title.

element.name: TReticuleMode
element.short: The mode of reticule drawing.

element.name: TReticuleMode.rmNone
element.short: Do not draw reticule.

element.name: TReticuleMode.rmVertical
element.short: Draw reticule as a vertical line. Find nearest point by X coordinate.

element.name: TReticuleMode.rmHorizontal
element.short: Draw reticule as a horizontal line. Find nearest point by Y coordinate.

element.name: TReticuleMode.rmCross
element.short: Draw reticule as both vertical and horizontal line. Find nearest point by distanse.

element.name: TChart.ReticuleMode
element.short: Reticule drawing mode.

descr.p: Reticule is a line highlighting graph point nearest to the mouse cursor.
For reticule to be visible, the chart needs to:
1. Have ReticuleMode to value other that rmNone;
2. Have at least one series implementing GetNearestPoint interface (by default it is implemented by line, bar and area series);
3. Have UseReticule property of that series set to true.

element.name: TChart.AllowZoom
element.short: If true, user can zoom chart with the mouse.
element.descr: Allow user to zoom chart by drawing new zoom rectangle with the mouse while holding left mouse button.

element.name: TChart
element.short: Main charting component.

descr.p: The chart is composed of list of series and fixed elements like legend, axises and footers.
Chart methods work with two coordinate systems: floating-point coordinates supplied by series (often called graph coordinates) and on-screen coordinates (often called image coordinates)

element.name: TChart.BackColor
element.short: Color of back plane of the chart.
element.descr: Note that BackColor is different form the Color property which is used to paint the background of all TChart, including legend, axises and title.

element.name: TChart.Depth
element.short: The length of Z axis in 3D mode, in pixels. Zero value means 2D mode.

element.name: TChart.ExpandPercentage
element.short: Default extent size is increased by this percent. May be negative.

descr.p: To ensure full visualization of the extreme points of the chart, it is usually a good idea to set the default zoom value so that the default extent is slightly greater than the extent of chart data.
This can be done by either setting ExpandPercentage property, which increases the extent value relatively, setting the extent manually, or setting absolute margins.

element.name: TChart.Series
element.short: The list of chart series.
element.descr: To add or remove series at run-time, use AddSeries and DeleteSeries methods.

element.name: TChart.SeriesCount
element.short: The number of chart series, including inactive ones.

element.name: TChart.Foot
element.short: Chart footer.

element.name: TChart.Frame
element.short: The pen to draw frame around the chart.
element.descr: Set Frame.Visible to false to turn off frame drawing.

element.name: TChart.AxisList
element.short: List of graph axises.

element.name: TChart.BottomAxis
element.short: Bottom axis of the chart.
element.descr: Retrieves first axis from the AxisList with Alignment set to calBottom.

element.name: TChart.LeftAxis
element.short: Left axis of the chart.
element.descr: Retrieves first axis from the AxisList with Alignment set to calLeft.

element.name: TChart.Legend
element.short: Chart legend.

element.name: TChart.OnDrawReticule
element.short: Called each time the reticule is updated.

element.name: TChart.Margins
element.short: Margins around the chart sides in default extent, in pixels.
element.descr: Note that the margins set by this property have effect only on the default extent. Use BorderSpacing property to set margins independently of zoom level.

element.name: TChart.Extent
element.short: Manual overrides for the chart extent borders.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries
element.short: The basic chart series class. Do not inherit or instantiate directly.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.Draw
element.short: Draw the series on a given canvas.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.IsEmpty
element.short: Return true if the series contains no data.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.Active
element.short: If true, this series is visible and taken into account in extent calculation.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.Depth
element.short: The extent of the series along Z axis, in pixels. Zero for 2D series.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.ParentChart
element.short: The chart owning this series

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.ShowInLegend
element.short: If true, this series is displayed in the legend.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.Title
element.short: Series title to show in legend.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.ZPosition
element.short: Offset of the series along Z-axis, in pixels. Also determines series drawing order.

descr.p: The series are drawn in order of decreasing ZPosition value.
So to bring series on 2D chart to front, set it's ZPosition to 0.

element.name: TChartSeriesList
element.short: The list of chart series.

element.name: TChartSeriesList.Items
element.short: Retrieve char series by index.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.AfterAdd
element.short: Called after the series was added to a chart.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.AfterDraw
element.short: Called after the series is drawn.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.BeforeDraw
element.short: Called before the series is drawn.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.GetLegendItems
element.short: Get the list of legend items for this series.
element.descr: Note that the series may return several items. For example, pie series displays a separate legend item for each pie slice.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.UpdateBounds
element.short: Update the default chart extent according to this series data.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.UpdateMargins
element.short: Update chart margins according to this series data.
element.descr: In particular, margins are used to make room for labels.

element.name: TChart.AddSeries
element.short: Add given series to this chart.
element.descr: Note that the series can only belong to a single chart.

element.name: TChart.ClearSeries
element.short: Remove all series from this chart.

element.name: TChart.DeleteSeries
element.short: Delete given series from the chart.

element.name: TChart.PaintOnCanvas
element.short: Draw the chart on a given canvas. May be used to print the chart.

element.name: TChart.ZoomFull
element.short: Restore the default zoom level.

element.name: TChart.SaveToImage
element.short: Return a raster image of the given type with the screenshot of the chart.
element.descr: The image must be freed by calling code.

element.name: TChart.SaveToFile
element.short: Save chart screenshot to a file as a raster image of the given type.

element.name: TChart.SaveToBitmapFile
element.short: Save chart screenshot to a file as a bitmap image.

element.name: TBasicChartSeries.GetNearestPoint
element.short: Get the series point nearest to APoint as measured by ADistFunc.
element.descr: Return true if such a point exists.

element.name: TChart.GraphToImage
element.short: Convert Ñ„ point from graph coordinates to image coordinates.

element.name: TChart.ImageToGraph
element.short: Convert a point from image coordinates to graph coordinates.

element.name: TChart.XGraphToImage
element.short: Convert X graph coordinate to image coordinate.

element.name: TChart.YGraphToImage
element.short: Convert Y graph coordinate to image coordinate.

element.name: TChart.XImageToGraph
element.short: Convert X image coordinate to graph coordinate.

element.name: TChart.YImageToGraph
element.short: Convert Y image coordinate to graph coordinate.

element.name: TChart.CurrentExtent
element.short: Return the chart extent at the current zoom level.

element.name: TChart.XGraphMax

element.name: TChart.XGraphMin
element.short: Deprecated, use CurrentExtent instead.

element.name: TChart.YGraphMax
element.short: Deprecated, use CurrentExtent instead.

element.name: TChart.YGraphMin
element.short: Deprecated, use CurrentExtent instead.

element.name: TChart.CopyToClipboardBitmap
element.short: Save chart screenshot to the clipboard.
